Hql.Base.InterestRate

Description

This module defines interest rates, discounting and compounding

Documentation

data Compounding

Coumpounding modes

Constructors

Simple

1+rt

Compounded

(1+r/f)**(f**t) with f being the frequency per year

Continuous

exp(rt)

SimpleThenCompounded

Simple within a year, Coumpounded over one year

discountFactor

rate

-> Compounding

-> Maybe Frequency

compoundFactor :: Double -> DayCounter -> Compounding -> Maybe Frequency -> Date -> Date -> Maybe Date -> Maybe Date -> Double

Compute compound factor, usage is the same as with discount factor
